Issue.creator: aambati
Issue.summary: As a user I want ability to get idemix credential from Fabric CA server
Issue.description: Users want ability to get an idemix credential from the fabric CA server. Users could be new (just registered) or already have enrolled and obtained X509 certificate from the server. Users should be able to use basic auth (userid , password returned by the registration request) or oauth token based on X509 certificate
